title.rendered: How to Install Microsoft 365 on a computer using the product key?

content.rendered:
Install Microsoft Office 365 using the product key

The 64-bit version is installed by default unless Office detects you already have a 32-bit version of Office (or a stand-alone Office app such as Project or Visio) installed. In this case, the 32-bit version of Office will be installed instead, visit microsoft365.com/setup or account.microsoft.com to locate your service and subscription Click on manage download and hit Install on this device then follow the on-screen option. follow the steps mentioned below to install Office on your computer:

Install Microsoft Office 365 on Windows

  1. Visit the folder where you downloaded the microsoft365.com/setup.
  2. The downloaded files will usually be found in the “Downloads” folder.
  3. Double-click the Office setup .exe file once you have seen it through.
  4. Select the Yes option on the next screen.
  5. In a matter of minutes, your Office setup will be installed successfully.
  6. When the screen prompts you to finish the installation, hit the Finish button.

Install Microsoft Office 365 on Mac

  • Look for the arrow where you downloaded the microsoft365.com/setup.
  • The downloaded files will usually be found in the “Downloads” folder.
  • Double-click the Office setup dmg file once you have seen it through.
  • Select the Yes option on the next screen.
  • In a matter of minutes, your Office setup will be installed successfully.
  • When the screen prompts you to finish the installation, hit the Finish button
